name: places/ChIJrRFH7apZwokRN05uvHj_8G4

displayName.text: African American Art Auction Galleries LLC.com

formattedAddress: 323 E 58th St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 323 E 58th St, New York, NY 10022-2217, USA

originalText.text: I am an African American man of 64 years old.Great place to visit, I haven't been inside but I've seen some of the art. I live in Saginaw Michigan and I'm an artist and the paintings you see are done by me. I've painted a total of 50. It's a new art movement that I've put in motion for the world to see. The name of my newly created art movement/style, is entitled the 'Phrenzie Art Movement/Style by DLH Jr. It is not to be confused with any other art movement or style. Everything about it is newly created by the artist. The name of it is newly created and the definition to the name is also newly created. The word Phrennszie is not to be confused with the word frenzy that's in the world dictionaries. I do regular art but it has become flat, boring and it does not enhance creativity and it does not stimulate the imagination. So I created something new. It has to be taught to anyone who is interested in it. Even an artist with an inborn talent for art has to be taught and it can be taught to anyone who doesn't have an inborn talent but has the dream of becoming an artist. I have also written an an instruction booklet on how to do my art. It can not be forged by anyone not even an expert forger. My art is very popular in the area I live in with over 125,000 people interested in bidding on. I've been invited to display my art in several places in the USA and abroad. I recently had to have a brain tumor removal operation and had to postpone my invitations. Just wanted to share this with the world. God bless you all.
